Only two flaws as of now,1.Difficult to insert the foot into shoe,because opening is too small.Ony the top most two slots  can be opened.Rest of the rings with laces are fixed.so we find it wery difficult to insert the foot into shoe.2.Shoe laces given are flimsy and too short.Don't know how long they last.Company should look into the design  and modify it to make it more comfortable and customer friendly.As to the comfort and durability,I can only say after using for a few days.May be another review if any flaws.

Asian Creta 12 shoes come with comfortable outside material and an inner Memory Foam.Shoes are designed in the budget segment and can be used for walking. Looks good but while testing it in the outdoor conditions I found that it's not that much comfort from the corners. Sole comfort is not good and direct contact with the surface can be felt.A sock-like structure and good design make it a good deal but however comfort can't be compromised.

Few days ago I ordered this product, product delivered in the right time.Then I unbox it, the box was damaged, looks like someone take from scrape..Its ok,Then come to the product, and the product also damaged, leff shoe steeching is not proper..I love this shoes comfort, its very good.. And stylish, and looks very pretty.But this shoes upper side made from yarn/fabric, you cant wash confidently, but if you take white color you have to wash,Otherwise you cant ware publicly,As I feel in my hand - if you use daily it lasts maybe 6 to 8 months...Its my feeling, not mandatory for all....Thank you..
Reality is completely different, product is not upto the mark and expectations, its not comfortable to wear.

Great shoes at an affordable price.Qualities of the shoes-1.Great comfort with double layered grip(5/5).2.Very lightweight(5/5).3.Little high price but affordable(3.5/5).4.Very durable and strong material is used(5/5).5.The breathable mesh material is great(5/5).6.Best for running,walking,casual wear,sports,etc.(4.5/5).7.Laces are of right size so no worry of repeatedly tying(5/5).8.Nice non slippery sole(5/5).

The size is same but the inner neck has a cloth that is fixed( seems as if a socks inside) which causes Stiffness. The actual purpose of the lace would be useless as the neck is not expandable. Otherwise product is very good and worth the money. Just go one/ two size more.

It would have been better for the price & advertisement. It's a canvas type shoe & not useful for running as mentioned. The inner layer & company name tag at ankle portion (see the image),always intervene while wearing shoes, really it disturbs.No proper packing, just I received the bare shoe box closed all sides with tape. Overall shoes are good only for normal walk. Better to try other shoe brands.
